pages.text: Getting bored with your tools?$(br2)Tinker's Construct helps you here!$(br)It adds customizable tools and armor and other things.$(br)Best study the $(item)guide book$() for more info.

It's worth noticing, that there are several guides for this mod. $(item)Materials and you$() will get you into one part and you make other books that guide you further.$(br2)There are also gadgets though, that have their own guide. Look it up!
